scenarios.scenario_description: You will get the choice between dumpster diving, or begging

options.name: Dumpster Dive
options.description: Dumpster dive to possibly find something valuable that you could sell for a higher price

options.name: Beg
options.description: Literally just sit on the floor and beg people for money

scenarios.scenario_description: You could either continue flipping items you found in the dumpster for a profit, or you can take a trip to your local resturant and request them for a job.

options.name: Dumpster Diving
options.description: Dumpster dive to possibly find something valuable that you could sell for a higher price

options.name: Get a job at local resturant

scenarios.scenario_description: You could either become a waiter, or you can tutor little kids

options.name: Tutoring Little Kids
options.description: You have to teach little kids math

scenarios.scenario_description: You can tutor little kids, or you can buy yourself the latest MacBook Air and learn to code

options.name: Tutoring Little Kids
options.description: You have to teach little kids math

options.name: Buying Computer
options.description: You can buy the latest MacBook Air and learn to code

scenarios.scenario_description: You can tutor little kids, or you can go to college

options.name: Tutoring Little Kids
options.description: You have to teach little kids math

options.name: College
options.description: Go to college and get a computer science degree

scenarios.scenario_description: While driving to your friends house, a car crashed into you on the highway, you know it was not at all your fault as you had the right of way, you have two options

options.name: Pursue legal action
options.description: You will sue this driver for the damages that you have faced

options.name: Do not pursue legal action
options.description: You will not pursue any legal action for the damages that you have faced.

scenarios.scenario_description: You can drop everything you are doing and just do dropshipping, or you can work a full time job as a Tech Lead at FaceBook

options.name: Dropshipping
options.description: Drop everything you are doing and just do dropshipping, a business model where you buy products for cheap, and sell them for a higher price on your website.

options.name: Full-Time Job
options.description: Work a full-time job as a Tech Lead at FaceBook
